short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A different english word with its description.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
A random word is picked for you daily and it is kept through whole day unless you pass the word.

The word is appeared in opening the browser, and it is reminded in a determined period if you adjust.

To pass the word, press the key p on your keyboard.
